metadata.description: Email to send all notification for MOC Registration(Operations) expiration
Provides current environment base url. No back slash ending.

parameters.$filter: (ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null and statecode eq 0 and (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),-30),'yyyy-MM-dd')}')) and _ovs_siteid_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null)

MessageText.inputs:
Hello/Bonjour,

Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} expired 30 days ago.

Please use the following link to navigate directly to the operation:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}
___________________________________________________________________________________

Opération @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} a expiré il y a 30 jours.

Veuillez utiliser le lien suivant pour accéder directement à l’opération:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello/Bonjour,

Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} expired 30 days ago.

Please use the following link to navigate directly to the operation:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}
___________________________________________________________________________________

Opération @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} a expiré il y a 30 jours.

Veuillez utiliser le lien suivant pour accéder directement à l’opération:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}

parameters.$filter: (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}') and ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null  and statecode eq 0 and ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and fdr_registrationtype/_fdr_standard_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/accountid ne null) and (fdr_registrationtype/fdr_containertypeid ne null)

EmailBodyExpiredNotfication.inputs:
Your registration under number @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} expired on @{formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

You are no longer registered, and any registered mark associated with this registration shall no longer be applied. Please advise us if you would like to close your file by responding to this email.

To renew your registration, you must submit a renewal request and send it to MOCregister-registrecontenant@tc.gc.ca.

Operation Type: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_englishname']}
Standard: @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceetxt']}
Company Name: @{outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname']}
Site address: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

If you have already applied to renew your registration, please disregard this notice.

________________________________________________________________________

Votre inscription sous le numéro @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} a expiré le @{formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

Vous n'êtes plus inscrit, et toute marque enregistrée associée à cette inscription, ne doit plus être appliquée. Veuillez nous aviser si vous désirez fermer votre dossier en répondant à ce courriel.

Pour renouveler votre inscription, vous devez soumettre une demande de renouvellement par courriel à MOCregister-registrecontenant@tc.gc.ca.

Type d’opération: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_frenchname']}
Norme: @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceftxt']}
Nom d’entreprise: @{if(empty(outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr']),outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname'],outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr'])}
Localisation: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

Si vous avez déjà soumis une demande de renouvellement, aucune action n’est requise de votre part.

parameters.item/subject: Transport Canada – Expiry Notice / Transports Canada – Avis d’expiration
Transport Canada –Renewal Notice / Transports Canada – Avis de renouvellement

EmailBody.inputs:
Your registration under number @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} will expire on @{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')} Please advise us if you would like to close your file by responding to this email.

To renew your registration, you must submit a renewal request and send it to MOCregister-registrecontenant@tc.gc.ca..

Operation Type: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_englishname']}
Standard: @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceetxt']}
Company Name: @{outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname']}
Site address: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

If you have already applied to renew your registration, please disregard this notice.

________________________________________________________________________

Votre inscription sous le numéro @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} vient à échéance le @{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

Veuillez nous aviser si vous désirez fermer votre dossier en répondant à ce courriel.

Pour renouveler votre inscription, vous devez soumettre une demande de renouvellement par courriel à MOCregister-registrecontenant@tc.gc.ca.

Type d’opération: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_frenchname']}
Norme: @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceftxt']}
Nom d’entreprise: @{if(empty(outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr']),outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname'],outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr'])}
Localisation: @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

Si vous avez déjà soumis une demande de renouvellement, aucune action n’est requise de votre part.

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="queue">
<attribute name="name"/>
<attribute name="emailaddress"/>
<attribute name="queueid"/>
<order attribute="name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="name" operator="eq" value="MOC Register / Registre Contenant"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>
